name: High School Daze: Junior Year (DEMO)
description:
STORY

The most stressful year of high school is also the most fun to be had if you can balance classes, extracurriculars, and the oh-so elusive social life. 

You’re a high school junior starting the second quarter, who until now has made decent grades, held your own on the girls’ weightlifting team, and been through thick and thin with your supportive best friend, Billie Stevenson.

But maybe it’s time to switch things up? Step outside your comfort zone and cross a few things off your bucket list? After all, there’s more to life than straight As, and maybe old and new friendships can blossom into something more. 

High School Daze: Junior Year features:

  • 3 female love interests
  • 2 male love interests 
  • 1 friendship path

Different choices lead to different outcomes, with unique dialogue and events each playthrough.

This game is currently rated 13+ for language.

RELEASE INFORMATION (PROJECTED DATES)

Demo - Summer 2021

Full game - Winter 2022
